exercises.name: Mixed Modal Conditioning
exercises.notes: Rotate bike/row/jump rope/MB slams for 15–25 min.

exercises.name: Adductor Rockbacks
exercises.notes: Adductor mobility; great for squat depth comfort.

exercises.name: T-Spine Rotation (Open Books)
exercises.notes: Helps pressing and upper back positioning.

exercises.name: Shoulder Opener (Rings Assisted)
exercises.notes: Gentle assisted shoulder mobility using rings.

exercises.name: Ab Wheel Rollout
exercises.notes: Progress from knees to full; keep ribs down.

exercises.name: Wall Handstand Hold
exercises.notes: Quality positions; build time under tension.

exercises.name: Wall Handstand Push-Up
exercises.notes: Range as tolerated; pike HSPU regression if needed.
